resource_description: Authoritative Kubernetes documentation covering core concepts (Pods, Deployments, Services, Ingress), cluster operations, scheduling, networking, storage, and best practices. Use for accurate, production-grade guidance and CLI examples (kubectl) across versions.

Official Monopoly rulebook with gameplay setup, turn order, property transactions, Chance/Community Chest effects, jail rules, houses/hotels, auctions, and end-game conditions. Use for precise rules clarifications and edge cases.

FastAPI framework documentation focusing on path operations, dependency injection, Pydantic models, validation, async I/O, background tasks, middleware, and OpenAPI generation. Use for Python web API design patterns and examples.

Spring Boot reference including auto-configuration, starters, configuration properties, MVC/WebFlux, data access (JPA), Actuator, testing, and deployment. Use for Java microservice patterns and production hardening tips.
